description: This file is the main application setup for a Food Delivery frontend built with Lightning.js. It imports UI components, pages, theme, and store plugins, and defines the application structure, including routes, components, and layout.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Provides the reactive state containing theme and config objects.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: Defines the routing paths and associated components for the app.

methods.name: created
methods.description: Initialization hook that sets theme and config on the app instance.
